Notes.Text:
This update for php53 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2016-8670: Stack Buffer Overflow in GD dynamicGetbuf (bsc#1004924)
- CVE-2016-6911: Check for out-of-bound read in dynamicGetbuf() (bsc#1005274)
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: The dynamicGetbuf function in the GD Graphics Library (aka libgd) before 2.2.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via a crafted TIFF image.

Vulnerabilities.Description: Integer signedness error in the dynamicGetbuf function in gd_io_dp.c in the GD Graphics Library (aka libgd) through 2.2.3, as used in PHP before 5.6.28 and 7.x before 7.0.13, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (stack-based buffer overflow) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted imagecreatefromstring call.
